MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 11-JAN-2021 14:10.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH49 postcode area of Greasby, affecting properties in Greasby Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:14 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:15 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:28 pm on 11th January, 2021.
